label: METAGENassist
summary: User-friendly, web-based analytical pipeline for comparative metagenomic studies. Input can be derived from either 16S rRNA data or NextGen shotgun sequencing.
features: Easy-to-use point-and-click web interface; data visualization; publication-quality graphs and charts; wide variety of statistical methods; taxon-to-phenotype mapping; data filtering and normalization; supports many common input formats
